name: CyberViewPlus
0:
”Alexa, show me the camera”
”Alexa, show me the frontdoor”
”Alexa, go home”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The CyberView Plus skill is to enable the device added on the CyberView Plus App to communicate with Alexa devices.

1. After downloading the CyberView Plus App, log in or register the CyberView Plus account. 
2. Open the Alexa App to search "CyberView Plus" and enable it, and then the Alexa-supported device will display on the All devices page of the Alexa App. 
After that, the user can watch the streaming of the camera through the Alexa device and talk to the person in front of the camera.

After adding a new device or deleting a device in CyberView Plus App, the device will appear or disappear on the All devices page of the Amazon Alexa App. 

If you want to view the streaming of the camera, you can say: 
"Alexa, show me the yard."
"Alexa, show me the camera."

If you want to pause, you can say: 
"Alexa, stop."
"Alexa, go home."

If you share the camera with others in the CyberView Plus App, they can also use the Alexa device to watch the camera’s streaming.
